document_data.name: Daliabint Khalil
document_data.mainbody: '''Dalia bint Khalil''' was a the youngest daughter of [[Grand Caliph]] [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir]] in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Like her older sister [[Janya bint Khalil|Janya]], Dalis lived in the [[Royal Harim of Huzuz|Royal Harim]] for the first few years of her life before being moved to a secure location within [[Al-Akara Mountains]]. She still visited her parents on a regular basis.
document_data.Relationships: Dalia was the child of Khalil and his most favored wife [[Tanya bint Perijan]]. Her name was Khalil's way of honoring is first wife, [[Dalilah al-Nakar]], though he of course received Tanya's permission before naming her.
